attributes.action: An immediate pause on immigration to the United Kingdom.
attributes.additional_details: I along with many other UK citizens have deep concerns with the staggering number of people moving to our small island every year. Not only is it impossible to provide housing for such an amount of people it could also be a threat to our country’s values and more importantly our children’s future.
attributes.background: We the native people of the United Kingdom want an immediate pause on immigration to our small island. Especially after our Prime Minister confirmed that the independent Office Of National Statistics reported that our previous government were conducting an open borders experiment.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700824
